LinkText: Philadelphia Emerging Technologies for the Enterprise
Message: An awesome expo for East Coast developers. I am not just saying that because I work for the sponsor.
My new favorite web development framework.
How could I not include Jeff Atwood's Blog.
Keith Gregory is a developer that I have worked with for a couple of years. Unlike myself, he actually posts regularly.
Date Fecak's blog. Dave runs the Philadelphia Java Users Group.
Another great web comic, and source for holiday gifts.
The Church of Pastafarianism. Need I say more.
